name: Augmented Swordplay
description: You've poured through the technical binder and have become one with the high-frequency blade. Furthermore, you've learned how to block using bionic arms and legs.

static_buffs.name: Heightened Focus
static_buffs.description: Time seems to slow down as you ready your blade.

onattack_buffs.name: Augmented Block
onattack_buffs.description: Blocking any counter attack done by the enemy.

onattack_buffs.name: Augmented Parry
onattack_buffs.description: Parried and stunned the enemy. Next attack will deal increased damage.
